alert.note: Alert for Nicholas; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 6:06PM EST until January 11 at 2:43AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River at Blue Licks Spring affecting Robertson and Nicholas Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Licking River at Blue Licks Spring. * WHEN...From this evening to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Cropland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM EST Sunday the stage was 23.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 26.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued tonight.
